sentences.sentence: They bought their own dishes and silverware and brought them to America.
sentences.translation: 他们买了自己的盘子和银器，并把它们带到美国。

sentences.sentence: Today, most people in Western cultures expect to eat meals with their own set of silverware, their own plates, and their own glasses.
sentences.translation: 今天，西方文化中大多数人希望用自己的一套银器、盘子和杯子吃饭。

sentences.sentence: He has his own silverware at home.
